response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us and represents years of expertise and innovation. We are offering it to you at a special price of $15,000, which we believe reflects its true worth and provides you with exceptional savings. We understand that the value of this product may be subjective to you, but we assure you that it is a remarkable investment. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be joining a select group of individuals who appreciate the quality and craftsmanship that goes into every piece. Let's make this a win-win situation for both parties.", "product_price": 15000}
